code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import reduxThunk from"redux-thunk";import{createBrowserHistory}from"history";import{routerMiddleware}from'connected-react-router';import createRootReducer from"modules/reducers";export var history=createBrowserHistory();function configureStore(initialState){var middleware=[reduxThunk,routerMiddleware(history)];var store=createStore(createRootReducer(history),initialState,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));return store;}export default configureStore;
